summary: A photographer's obsessive pursuit of dark subject matter leads him into the path of a serial killer who stalks late night commuters, ultimately butchering them in the most gruesome ways.
cast: Bradley Cooper|Leslie Bibb|Brooke Shields|Vinnie Jones|Roger Bart|Tony Curran|Barbara Eve Harris|Peter Jacobson|Stephanie Mace|Ted Raimi|Nori Satô|Quinton 'Rampage' Jackson|Dan Callahan|Donnie Smith|Earl Carroll|Allen Maldonado|Michael Shawn McCracken|Ryan McDowell|Eddie Vargas|Kelvin O'Bryant|Jayson Sanchez|Brian Taylor|Greg Brown|Geoffrey Gould|Bryn Hammond|Chris LaCentra|Kate Mulligan
title: El vagón de la muerte
